name: Gorgon Sisters
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Kuja Pirates
effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may reveal 3 {Amazon Lily} or {Kuja Pirates} type cards from your hand: Give your Leader and all of your Characters up to 1 rested DON!! card each.
trigger: [Trigger] If your Leader has the {Kuja Pirates} type, play this card.
